title: Talking about Someone
list: May I ask how old you are?
You're not forty yet, are you?
We are of the same age.
I'm five years older than you are.
I was thirty on my last birthday.
I'm going to be 27 next sunday.
You are not old enough to smoke.
I can't drive a car yet.
He is too old to go out for a walk.
His legs are too long for his inches.
She stands out in the crowd for she is two meters in height.
Her weight went down to a satisfactory level.
During her illness her weight went down from fifty kilos to forty kilos.
I never care about my weight.
Do you worry about your weight?
She is so slender and slim but curvy.
Her skin is white as snow.
Your skin is dark but healthy.
She had the most beautiful blue eyes I had ever seen.
She has a very pleasant smile and she always has a twinkle in her eye.
When he laughs, we see his even teeth.
When she smiled, she showed her white, even teeth.
She is a girl with long straight hair.
Her hair is brown and curly.
He has no hair on the top of his head.
I have had my hair cut and permed.
Why are you always full of energy?
Your brother is really a man of the world.
I'm willing to learn and progress.
I have a strong determination to succeed.
He is mature, dynamic and honest.
He is willing to work under pressure with leadership quality.
He has the ability to deal with personnel at all levels effectively.
He is a man with good analytical capability.
She is a girl with a pleasant, mature attitude.
She is elegant with nice personality.
He is a very stingy person.
He always smites with a tongue.
She would find every opportunity to stab in the back of others.
She always has an axe to grind.
The old woman doesn't have her heart in the right place.
She always speaks with her tongue in her cheek.
He always goes back on his words.
She's the one that would bite the hand that feeds her.
The old man's action is quite weird.
He has a bad mood, she selfish.
